itemDescription: Welsh footballer who played as a forward in the 1880s and 1890s

wikipedia_page.main: William Roberts (born 1863) was a Welsh footballer who played as a forward in the 1880s and made one appearance for Wales.

response: *William Roberts (born 1863, fl. 1880s – 1890s), international footballer
